statements: UPDATE multimedia_assets SET asset_url = 'https://new-url.com' WHERE asset_id = 1;
UPDATE multimedia_assets SET asset_name = 'New Name', asset_metadata = '{"author": "John Doe"}' WHERE asset_id = 2;
UPDATE multimedia_assets SET asset_name='New Image', asset_metadata='{"size": "large"}' WHERE asset_id=101;
UPDATE multimedia_assets SET asset_url='https://updated-url.com', asset_type='video', asset_metadata='{"duration": "10 mins"}' WHERE asset_id=202;
UPDATE images SET image_name = 'New Image Name', image_size = 500 WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE videos SET video_resolution = '1080p', video_duration = 120 WHERE video_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE images SET image_name='New Image Name', image_size=1024 WHERE image_id='7aad9ec2-74df-4b4d-9107-85156d26a846';
UPDATE videos SET video_name='New Video Name', video_duration=180, video_resolution='1080p' WHERE video_id='62277a5a-5d98-4d6d-9729-55098b863309';
UPDATE images SET file_name='image1.jpg', file_size=1024 WHERE image_id=1;
UPDATE videos SET resolution='1080p', duration=120 WHERE video_id=1;
UPDATE images SET file_name = 'updated_image.jpg', file_size = 1500, upload_date = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE metadata SET tag = 'new_tag' WHERE metadata_id = 5;
UPDATE images SET image_description = 'New description', image_size = 1024 WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE video_metadata SET location = 'New location', capture_date = '2023-09-15' WHERE metadata_id = 2;
UPDATE images SET image_size = 1024, image_description = 'Updated Image Description' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE video_metadata SET location = 'New Location', capture_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE metadata_id = 3;
UPDATE images SET image_name = 'New Image Name 1', image_url = 'https://example.com/image1.jpg' WHERE image_id = '4f82547f-4e79-4a96-83fe-50f6f8bf6ec3';
UPDATE videos SET video_url = 'https://example.com/video2.mp4', video_name = 'New Video Name 2' WHERE video_id = '8740819c-3a3a-4766-9735-ebccc3b045e7';
UPDATE images SET image_metadata = '{}' WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE images SET image_metadata = '{"key1": "value1","key2": "value2"}' WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
